glsa.title: Trac: Cross-site request forgery
glsa.synopsis: Trac allows remote attackers to execute unauthorized actions as other users.

background.p: Trac is a wiki and issue tracking system for software development projects.

description.p: Trac allows users to perform certain tasks via HTTP requests without performing correct validation on those requests.

impact.p: An attacker could entice an authenticated user to browse to a specially crafted URL, allowing the attacker to execute actions in the Trac instance as if they were the user.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Trac users should upgrade to the latest version:
